fr.cryptohash

Class SHA256

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.cryptohash.DigestEngine
      • fr.cryptohash.MDHelper
        • fr.cryptohash.SHA2Core
          • fr.cryptohash.SHA256
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Digest

    public class SHA256
extends SHA2Core

    This class implements the SHA-256 digest algorithm under the Digest API. SHA-256 is specified by FIPS 180-2.
